info.name: LogicGate API

item.name: api-v1
assignments
{record}
Open and then return the record.

request.description: Assignment active date is updated to current time if the record is assigned to the principal user. This will transition the record's status from not started to in progress.

item.name: Updates the record, but does not progress it to the next node.
Delete mapping between two assignments.

query.description: Assignment ID to delete mapping with

item.name: Add a child record relationship to the record represented by the path variable.

query.description: Layout ID

request.description: The child may already exist or it may need to be created.

item.name: Add a parent record relationship to the record represented by the path variable.

query.description: Layout ID

request.description: The parent may already exist or it may need to be created.

item.name: Updates the record, progresses it to the appropriate node, and optionally assigns it to another user.
Updates the record, redirects it to the appropriate node, and optionally assigns it to another user. Redirects don't trigger record validation.
Return all assignments that are greater than the minimum updated time.

query.description: Minimum updated time value. The value is a unix timestamp.

item.name: Create an record that is assigned to the creator.

request.description: The record has a status of IN_PROGRESS. The returned object is the newly created record.

item.name: Create a public record.

request.description: Public assignments must included value map(s). Returns the saved public record.

item.name: current Values
Return a list of default current values based on a workflow.

query.description: workflow

item.name: Create a list of current values for a specified field.

query.description: field

item.name: Clear default status from any existing field default values and update the input current value list to default status. The saved default values are returned after.

query.description: field

item.name: Retrieve current values based on a field id.

query.description: Results page wanting to be retrieved
query
The number of elements to be returned
Sorting criteria in the format: object.property(,asc|desc)

item.name: Retrieve the user value options for a particular user field.

query.description: field
Results page wanting to be retrieved
query
The number of elements to be returned
Sorting criteria in the format: object.property(,asc|desc)

item.name: fields
workflow
{workflow Id}
Return a paginated list of fields from a particular workflow.
Return a paginated list of user fields based on a workflow and global user fields.
Return a list of fields from a particular a workflow.

query.description: Return archived values.

item.name: {id}
Find a specific field.

query.description: Retrieve archived values

item.name: Delete a field.
Create a field.

item.name: roles
Return all roles that are active and unlocked.
Create a new role.
Return a list of roles that are active and associated to the logged in principal user.
steps
Return a list of all nodes that are active and attached to a workflow.
Find a specific node.
users
Find all users regardless of status.
Create a user with no attached roles.
Disable a user. User making the request must have admin privileges.
Enable a user to be active. User making the request must have admin privileges.

importUsers

Return a list of all workflows that are active throughout all processes.

Return a list of all workflows that are active throughout all processes.

query.description: Results page wanting to be retrieved
query
The number of elements to be returned

item.name: Identify all paths from a particular workflow to relative workflows.

query.description: distinct
workflow

request.description: If the distinct parameter is passed as true, then this list will filter to distinct relative workflows.If the distinct parameter is omitted or passed as false, then relative workflows will be repeated if there are multiple paths to the relative.

item.name: Return a workflow that contains a specific step.
Find a specific workflow.
